page.title: 02Acredyke Nursery,Balornock
page.content: Acredyke Nursery School is situated in Northgate Road,Balornock.The nursery is in an "Area of Priority Treatment".This means that the nursery gets extra money to buy equipment.It also means that children who live in the immediate area are given places in the nursery first.After this children with special needs are given priority eg hearing or speech difficulties.At the moment the school has a roll of 95 children and also a full waiting list. The school is run by the headmistress Mrs Ferguson and staff.Mrs Ferguson is the only teacher in the school but there are 4 full-time nursery nurses and 2 part-time.The nursery is split into 2 ends.There is the quiet end where children can read,draw,do jig- saws and hear stories and the noisy end where they paint,bake and take part in physical activities.
